overview: The wettest DVD of the year! You like your action wild and wet? Then stand by for a complete drenching from this gang of sordid young piss lovers! These boys may look sweet and innocent, but when it comes to messing about with their friends they just can’t get enough of that golden nectar! Emptying their balls and their bladders, they’re never, ever happy until they and all their mates are completely soaked through! Three hours of ultimate filth by Vlado Iresch....
title: Taking the Piss
